ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An applied_classification_assignment is a type of that associates an instance of or of one of its specializations with one or more classification_item instances for classification purposes.
The considered group is specified with the inherited attribute assigned_class. The considered group may be a class or a characterized_class. Specific application modules address particular kinds of classification. The entity applied_security_classification_assignment, defined in module security_classification, will be used in order to represent confidentiality level classification.
The meaning of the association is specified with the inherited attribute role.
Where applicable, the following value of classification role name shall be used:
'reference': the items to which the classification assignment applies, are by intent incompletely transferred.
This value can be used when assembly data are exchanged iteratively between two partners, to avoid to send twice the CAD files that contain the geometric representation of each component.
the set of one or more instances of types listed in classification_item, that are associated with the classification information.
